#summary How to install & run slimrat
#labels Featured,Phase-Deploy

 * make sure you have `perl` and `wget` installed
 * install needed perl modules
  * perl modules:
   * `Getopt::Long	`	
   * `Gtk2::GladeXML`
   * `Gtk2::SimpleList`
   * `LWP::UserAgent`
   * `Term::ANSIColor`
   * `WWW::Mechanize`
  * Debian: `aptitude install libwww-mechanize-perl libgtk2-gladexml-perl`
  * FreeBSD: `portinstall -Pp ftp/wget devel/p5-Getopt-Long devel/p5-Term-ANSIColor x11-toolkits/p5-Gtk2 x11-toolkits/p5-Gtk2-GladeXML x11-toolkits/p5-Gtk2-Ex-Simple-List www/p5-LWP-UserAgent-Determined www/p5-WWW-Mechanize`
 * Unpack the archive somewhere
 * Make symlinks in `$PATH`
{{{
ln -s /path/to/slimrat/slimrat /usr/local/bin/slimrat
ln -s /path/to/slimrat/slimrat-gui /usr/local/bin/slimrat-gui
}}}	
 * Run `slimrat --help` (CLI)
 * Run `slimrat-gui` (GUI)
